item.title: IntelliJ project not show hierarchy
item.description: IntelliJ project not show hierarchy # In some cases, that might lead IntelliJ to load project but won’t show the hierarchy as normally. How to fix # Step 1: Close all opened projects, and terminate completely IntelliJ application Step 2: Go to project folder Step 3: Remove idea / .idea folder Step 4: Re-open project with IntelliJ Now this is the result
